        public void stale()
        Equivalent to calling stale(false, 0)

      • stale

        public void stale​(boolean startTimer,
                  long delay)
        Optionally starts a timer that automatically calls die() if no updates come from this contact. The timer will fire after delay milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        startTimer - if true, then then once the delay elapses, the timer calls die()
        delay - if startTimer is false has no relevance
